channel.title: Backup for Mopar.. Read Here!
channel.description:
Ok, i've thought deeply about this:
If Mopar gets banned, taken off servers, muted, re-located, hacked ect., I can make a website that makes you sign up from another site and enter your the IP of there serving site. If you try to login/read on this site, it will re-direct you to some other site. You sign up on a .net server and the actual site is served by a prv.pl server. The IP of the site would have to be 100% confidential. Then in the login screen, you type the following:
Username: Password: Bot-Proof Letter Sequence: Website IP:
When all of the above is correct, it will redirect you to the actual Mopar site (ex, https://Moparforums.prv.pl) created. The web IP will be changed every week for safety and will be E-Mailed to the members. So in order to read, post, download, or upload anything on the site, you have to sign up on a different site such as (http://sign-in102.net). Does anyone think this is a good idea??

item.title: Backup for Mopar.. Read Here!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Mr.Chris:

I remember him saying he backs up the forum every 5 hours.

So thats why if goes offline about twice a day for a few mins.

Read full topic

item.title: Backup for Mopar.. Read Here!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“polska mafioso, post:1, topic:44991”]Ok, i’ve thought deeply about this:

If Mopar gets banned, taken off servers, muted, re-located, hacked ect., I can make a website that makes you sign up from another site and enter your the IP of there serving site. If you try to login/read on this site, it will re-direct you to some other site. You sign up on a .net server and the actual site is served by a prv.pl server. The IP of the site would have to be 100% confidential. Then in the login screen, you type the following:

Username:
Password:
Bot-Proof Letter Sequence:
Website IP:

When all of the above is correct, it will redirect you to the actual Mopar site (ex, https://Moparforums.prv.pl) created. The web IP will be changed every week for safety and will be E-Mailed to the members. So in order to read, post, download, or upload anything on the site, you have to sign up on a different site such as (http://sign-in102.net). Does anyone think this is a good idea??[/quote]

First of all, I’m 99.9% sure that mopars forums will not be shut down, unless for a good reason(such as kaitnieks when he shut down). And lets say the forums did get deleted, again I am 99.9% sure that mopar keeps backups of the forums quite often.

Read full topic
